definitions.text: the swift release of a store of affective force
examples: they got a great bang out of it
he got a quick rush from injecting heroin

definitions.text: an almost pleasurable sensation of fright
examples: a frisson of surprise shot through him

definitions.text: something that causes you to experience a sudden intense feeling or sensation
cause to be thrilled by some perceptual input
examples: The men were thrilled by a loud whistle blow

definitions.text: feel sudden intense sensation or emotion
examples: he was thrilled by the speed and the roar of the engine

definitions.text: tremble convulsively, as from fear or excitement

examples: The children were thrilled at the prospect of going to the movies
He was inebriated by his phenomenal success
